channel.title: Jumba la Makutano
channel.description: Recent content on Jumba la Makutano

item.title: Kuzaliwa mara ya Pili
item.description: Kuzaliwa mara ya pili ni fundisho ambalo kwa hakika watu wengi wamekuwa wakiendelea kutokulielewa licha ya kwamba tangu fundisho hili litolewe na Bwana wetu Yesu kristo hapo mwanzoni alilieleza bayana kabisa. Fundisho hili kwa sababu ya kutokueleweka kwake limekuwa ndio chanzo kikubwa cha upotevu na uharibifu mkubwa katika dunia ya leo na hilo ambalo ndilo tegemeo la dunia(KANISA). Yesu alisema ’Mtu asipozaliwa mara ya pili hatourithi uzima wa milele’maana ya maneno hayo watu walishindwa kumuelewa toka hapo katika hayo makutano.

item.title: Nafasi na Kisa cha Rohoni
item.description: NAFASI NA KISA CHA ROHONI (YA WOKOVU). Wagalatia 6:10 Waebrania 12:17 Nafasi ni nini? Akida Hamisi na waandishi wenzake (1981) katika Kamusi Ya Kiswahili Sanifu amefafanua kuwa Nafasi ni mahali palipo patupu na ambapo panaweza kuwekwa kitu. Oxford (2019) pia wafafanual neno nafasi kuwa ni eneo hali au mazingira yanayoruhusu au yanayo achilia uwezekano wa kitu kingine ama cha aina ileile kupata sehemu ya kukaa, kuishi, au kuwepo.

item.title: utaua
item.description: utaua ni maisha ya utakatifu kwa msaada wa yesu kristo sisi kama wanadamu kwa hakika hatuwezi peke yetu. utulivu wa maisha ni silaha

item.title: The Church: Pillars and Foundation of the Truth
item.description: How you view the church will determine how you view the Kingdom of God. The Kingdom of God is seen in and through the church. The church is what Jesus is building to bring forth the Kingdom of God upon the earth. When you believe the church is the manifestation of God’s Kingdom upon the earth and seek to build it you will reap the rewards of a blessed life now and in the age to come.

item.title: The Bible Dictionary
item.description: A Bible dictionary is a reference work containing encyclopedic entries related to the Bible, typically concerning people, places, customs, doctrine and Biblical criticism. Bible dictionaries can be scholarly or popular in tone. A Bible dictionary is a reference work containing encyclopedic entries related to the Bible, typically concerning people, places, customs, doctrine and Biblical criticism. Bible dictionaries can be scholarly or popular in tone. Daniel Semba A Bible dictionary is a reference work containing encyclopedic entries related to the Bible, typically concerning people, places, customs, doctrine and Biblical criticism.

item.title: About JLM
item.description: Jumba la Makutano ni mkusanyiko la watu wadini na madhehebu tofautitofauti ambao wanakutana kwa pamoja kwa dhumuni la kujifunza ujumbe wa kanisa kwa njia ya Yesu Kristo. Ni kusanyiko linalohubibiri Injili na kutoa fasiri ya maneno ya kinabii yaliyomo katika maandiko (biblia), ujumbe, mafundisho, na taafsiri hizo zinatokana na maongozi ya Roho Mtakatifu ambayo hutumia vipawa mbalimbali katika kusanyiko. Awali, Mungu alimvuvia Roho Mtakatifu mtumishi wake Kalunde na kumpa ufunuo juu ya uharibifu na upotevu wa kanisa lake hapa ulimwenguni.
